channel.title: davewiner tweets

item.description: Never seen a cartoon nail it so perfectly. https://t.co/VhJK7KGjeR
item.source:markdown: Never seen a cartoon nail it so perfectly. https://t.co/VhJK7KGjeR

item.description: When someone calls you a name you can try to overlook it and go on as if nothing happened, but it won't work. In my experience it's a relationship-ender. It may take you years to give up, or it could be instantaneous, but the friendship, if there ever was one, is over.
item.source:markdown: When someone calls you a name you can try to overlook it and go on as if nothing happened, but it won't work. In my experience it's a relationship-ender. It may take you years to give up, or it could be instantaneous, but the friendship, if there ever was one, is over.

item.description:
Suggestion to @twitter. I just got a warning about a tweet from July 7. I'd like to be able to see what it points to, but since the URL is obfuscated with the https://t.co/kE1rMbZQes domain, and there's no way to get to the offending tweet, I can't.

That doesn't seem right.

Here's a screen shot of the warning. https://t.co/XFfV1DSOoX
item.source:markdown:
Suggestion to @twitter. I just got a warning about a tweet from July 7. I'd like to be able to see what it points to, but since the URL is obfuscated with the https://t.co/kE1rMbZQes domain, and there's no way to get to the offending tweet, I can't.
That doesn't seem right.
Here's a screen shot of the warning. https://t.co/XFfV1DSOoX

item.description:
We got a message that an Electron app on Mac has "Nukespeed" adware in it. How can an Electron app be infected, and if it is what do you do about it?

https://t.co/F8EM63ZWi1

item.description:
The Mets broadcasters don’t bother calling the play by play or even telling us who’s at bat or pitching.

And the interviews are pure bullshit.
